title: When can we see number of wards placed again?
body: Ever since view advanced details has been broken there is no way to see the number of wards placed by each player. When will this be back?

replies.body:
Hi Laina

What is broken about "view advanced details" for you?  Do you mean match history on the web?  It should be working just fine...

Cheers
Mindstar
I think it was fixed the day I posted this. For 3 weeks it just said unavailable and I found another post saying it was a known bug.
